name: Spook a ball
description:
I made some simple modifications to the "Roll a ball" tutorial from unity, turning the simple collecting game into a harder and more sinister slender-like experience.
Thread lightly through the dark forest collecting the 6 cubes hidden near landmarks while being chased by an angered horde of ghost cubes. The curse is lifted once you colelct all cubes, and you will be haunted no more.
